message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $130. I think this is a fair price considering its worth.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your value proposition. I would like to counter with an offer of $100 for the product.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value.  I could come down to $120, which I feel is a very competitive price.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $110 for the product.
